SELECT DISTINCT A.YEAR, A.GOV_METRIC_ID, A.COMPARE_ID, A.FIELD, A.RES_OF_PROPER_DESC, A.IMPROVEMENT, A.RES_OF_1_BEF_DESC, A.INSERT_USER_ID, D.USER_NM AS INSERT_USER_NM, A.SORT_ORDER FROM GOV_DETAIL_COMPARE A LEFT OUTER JOIN GOV_METRIC B ON A.YEAR=B.YEAR AND A.GOV_METRIC_ID=B.GOV_METRIC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN GOV_DETAIL_EVAL_ITEM C ON B.YEAR = C.YEAR AND B.GOV_METRIC_ID = C.GOV_METRIC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_USERINFO D ON A.INSERT_USER_ID = D.USER_ID WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear#
A.GOV_METRIC_ID = #findGovMetric#
A.INSERT_USER_ID = #findInsertUser#
ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER

SELECT GOV_METRIC_ID ,GOV_METRIC_NM FROM GOV_METRIC WHERE YEAR =#findYear# AND DELETE_DT IS NULL AND GBN_ID='02' START WITH UP_METRIC_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR YEAR = YEAR AND PRIOR GOV_METRIC_ID = UP_METRIC_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY SORT_ORDER

SELECT GOV_METRIC_ID ,GOV_METRIC_NM FROM GOV_METRIC WHERE YEAR =#findYear# AND DELETE_DT IS NULL AND GBN_ID='02' AND GOV_METRIC_ID IN(SELECT GOV_METRIC_ID FROM GOV_DETAIL_EVAL_ITEM WHERE YEAR=#findYear# AND INSERT_USER_ID=#findInsertUser#) START WITH UP_METRIC_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR YEAR = YEAR AND PRIOR GOV_METRIC_ID = UP_METRIC_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY SORT_ORDER

SELECT DISTINCT A.INSERT_USER_ID, B.USER_NM AS INSERT_USER_NM FROM GOV_DETAIL_EVAL_ITEM A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_USERINFO B ON B.USER_ID = A.INSERT_USER_ID WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.GOV_METRIC_ID=#findGovMetric# ORDER BY B.USER_NM

SELECT YEAR , A.GOV_METRIC_ID , A.COMPARE_ID , A.FIELD , A.RES_OF_PROPER_DESC , A.IMPROVEMENT , A.RES_OF_1_BEF_DESC , A.SORT_ORDER , A.INSERT_USER_ID , A.CREATE_ID , B.USER_NM AS INSERT_USER_NM FROM GOV_DETAIL_COMPARE A INNER JOIN V_ROLE_USER B ON A.INSERT_USER_ID = B.USER_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.YEAR = #year# AND A.GOV_METRIC_ID = #govMetricId# AND A.COMPARE_ID = #compareId#
SELECT USER_NM FROM V_ROLE_USER WHERE USER_ID=#insertUserId# AND BEING_YN='Y'

SELECT 'GDC'||LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(COMPARE_ID,4,5)),0)+1,4,'0') SEQ FROM GOV_DETAIL_COMPARE
INSERT INTO GOV_DETAIL_COMPARE ( YEAR , GOV_METRIC_ID , COMPARE_ID , FIELD , RES_OF_PROPER_DESC , IMPROVEMENT , RES_OF_1_BEF_DESC , SORT_ORDER , INSERT_USER_ID , CREATE_ID , CREATE_DT ) VALUES ( #year# , #govMetricId# , #SEQ# , #field# , #resOfProperDesc# , #improvement# , #resOf1BefDesc# , #sortOrder# , #insertUserId# , #insertUserId# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE GOV_DETAIL_COMPARE SET FIELD = #field# , RES_OF_PROPER_DESC = #resOfProperDesc# , IMPROVEMENT = #improvement# , RES_OF_1_BEF_DESC = #resOf1BefDesc# , SORT_ORDER = #sortOrder# WHERE YEAR = #year# AND GOV_METRIC_ID = #govMetricId# AND COMPARE_ID = #compareId#
DELETE FROM GOV_DETAIL_COMPARE WHERE YEAR = #year# AND GOV_METRIC_ID = #govMetricId# AND COMPARE_ID = #compareId#
